p: Similar studies have demonstrated the activity of A. absinthium essential oil against the bacteria: Arthrobacter spp. , Bacillus mycoides, Micrococcus lylae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and against many species of fungi. The studies provided evidence for the greatest inhibition of pump activity against: Alternaria alternata, Fusarium oxysporum, F. sambucinum, F. solani and Aspergillus niger [ 88].
